title: Sony confirms John Wick game for PlayStation 5: Storyline, expected release date and all we know so far
snippet: Sony has revealed a AAA John Wick game for PlayStation 5, developed by Saber Interactive. The title will feature an original story, cinematic action, and the series’ signature gun-fu combat within the established timeline. Here's everything you need to know on the game.

title: End of the road for GPT-4o and GPT-5? OpenAI set to retire legacy GPT models today: Here's why
snippet: OpenAI is retiring GPT-4o and several older models from ChatGPT today, shifting focus to newer GPT-5 systems with improved personality, creativity and customisation. The change affects ChatGPT only, while API access remains unchanged.

title: OpenAI accuses DeepSeek of bypassing safeguards to replicate American AI models: Report
snippet: OpenAI has warned US lawmakers that DeepSeek may be using distillation tactics to copy American AI models, according to Reuters, raising fresh concerns over security, safeguards and the intensifying US China AI race.

title: India–AI Impact Summit 2026: Macron, Lula, Al Nahyan, among 20 global leaders to attend the mega event – full list
snippet: India is set to host the inaugural India–AI Impact Summit 2026 from February 16-20 in New Delhi, bringing together global leaders and experts to explore AI's role in sustainable development. This landmark event emphasizes inclusive growth under the theme 'Welfare for All, Happiness of All.'

title: iPhone 17e could bring MagSafe and A19 power at a lower price: Here's what the leaked video hints at
snippet: A new concept video hints at Apple’s upcoming iPhone 17e with Dynamic Island, MagSafe support and the A19 chip. The budget-friendly model may keep a familiar design, single 48MP camera and launch in three colours at a mid-range price point.

title: Google launches native YouTube app for Apple Vision Pro with 8K support: What it offers
snippet: Google has launched a native YouTube app for Apple Vision Pro, bringing immersive theatre-style viewing, spatial and 360° videos, and up to 8K playback on visionOS for a smoother, more complete experience.

title: Tecno Pova Curve 2 5G launched in India with 144Hz curved AMOLED and 8,000mAh battery: Price and specs
snippet: Tecno has launched the Pova Curve 2 5G in India with a 144Hz curved AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 7100 chip and a huge 8,000mAh battery with 45W charging. The phone goes on sale via Flipkart starting 20 February.

title: Nvidia likely to lease data centre funded by $3.8 billion junk-bond sale
snippet: Nvidia is set to lease a Nevada data center financed by a $3.8 billion junk-bond sale, underscoring the borrowing surge tied to AI infrastructure

All-in on AI: what TikTok creator ByteDance did next
snippet: ByteDance, the Beijing-based owner of TikTok, is shifting strongly into artificial intelligence after years of legal and privacy scrutiny. Its chatbot Doubao, launched in 2023, has become China’s most popular AI assistant with over 100 million daily users, rivalling services from OpenAI and Google.

title: AI is moving beyond IT into physical operations: Anant Maheshwari
snippet: Artificial intelligence is moving beyond IT services, with physical AI gaining traction in operations technology, said Anant Maheshwari of Honeywell at the ET NOW Global Business Summit. title: KLA inks MoU with TN govt for Rs 3,600 crore R&D and innovation campus in Chennai
snippet: KLA Corporation has signed an MoU with the Tamil Nadu government to set up a new R&D and innovation campus in Chennai, investing up to 3,600 crore over the next decade. The 12-acre site will expand existing operations. The facility may create 4,000 jobs and support advanced research and engineer

snippet: Spinny has secured 160–170 million in a funding round led by US-based investors Fidelity and Accel Leaders Fund. title: Amazon scraps partnership with surveillance company after Super Bowl ad backlash
snippet: Ring, Amazon's smart doorbell maker, and police surveillance tech company Flock said last year they were planning on working together to give Ring camera owners the option to share their video footage in response to law enforcement requests made through a Ring feature known as Community Requests.

title: Firstcry Q3 net loss widens to Rs 38 crore, revenue up 11.6%
snippet: However, Brainbees Solutions, the parent of the mother and baby care products retailer FirstCry, registered an 11.6% YoY rise in operating revenue to Rs 2,423 crore in the December quarter, from Rs 2,172 crore a year earlier. title: New-age tech companies to comprise 8-10% of India's listed m-cap in 10 years: Investor Kunal Bahl
snippet: Indian new-age technology firms are set for significant growth. They are predicted to form 8-10% of the nation's listed market cap within ten years. This expansion is driven by economic formalization and digitisation.
